name: SAP S/4 BAPI
description: Add a SAP Element to connect your existing S4 to the ERP Hub, allowing you to manage all of your ERP activities across multiple ERP Elements. You will need your SAP account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Jco Server Url
configuration.description: Url for the changes endpoint, this is used for getting the Idocs from JCO server

configuration.name: Event Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: SAP Bapi Event Notification Signature Key

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication
configuration.description: SAP Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: SAP Bapi Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Notification Callback URL
configuration.description: SAP Bapi Event Notification Callback URL

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: SAP Bapi Event Poller Resources Configuration

configuration.name: Event Notification Subscription ID
configuration.description: SAP Bapi Event Notification Subscription ID

resources.description: Generic API to call any BAPI with standard payload
Generic API to call to any BAPI schema

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

resources.description: Generic API to call any IDoc with IDoc payload
Get a list of all the fields for an object.

parameters.name: objectName
parameters.description: The name of the object or BAPI
